headline: ConocoPhillips' 3.84% Dividend Yield Implies COP Stock Could be 24% Undervalued
summary: ConocoPhillips Inc. raised its dividend by 7.7%, giving COP stock a 3.84% annual yield. That is well over its historical average, implying COP could be worth 24% more. One way to play it is to short out-of-the-money put options.
